name: Fluffy Hates Bannanas
description:
Fluffy Hates Bananas.

That's what the whole game is about. Don't touch the yellow bananas or you'll get hurt, touch the apples and you will be revived. <3

~Eclipse warning~  

This game is supposed to be super random and weird, there is a bunch of different characters to discover and see. They don't really talk to you haha.
